page.title: 01Mugh Dewchurch Hereford
page.content: An area of rolling arable and pasture land with a major spread out froest area with a small amout of orchards. A mixed community of rual workers and people working in local townss. Mostly private houses with council houses in Mugh Dewchurchsome of which have been recentily purchased by ocupiers. Many large country houses on farms. The 'Black Swan' pub in Mugh Dewchurch has a long hishtory. A coaching inn with scars from ancient battles. In the Aconbury area there are many small hollding. the major roads are Hereford to Monmouth and Hereford to Ross.
